- "The Western Center on Law and Poverty," from The LA Bar Bulletin, Oct. 1968 (3) -Univ. Of Toledo Law Review, Vol. 1970, No. 2 & 3, "Black Students in White Law Schools: The Ordeal and the Opportunity" (2) - "Black Students in White Law Schools: The Ordeal and the Opportunity" from Univ. Of Toledo Law Review, Vol. 1970 (paper) - "In Defense of Minority Admissions Programs: A Response to Professor Graglia," from UPenn Law Review, Dec. 1970 (3) -University of Pennsylvania Law Review, Vol. 119, No. 2, Dec. 1970, "In Defense of Minority Admissions Programs: A Response to Professor Graglia" - "School Litigation Strategies for the 1970's: New Phases in the Continuing Quest for Quality Schools," from - Book Review "Horowitz & Karst: Law, Lawyers & Social Change: Cases & Materials on the Abolition of Slavery, Racial Segregation & Inequality of Educational Opportunity" from UCLA Law Review, Feb.. 1971 (3) -Harvard Law School Bulletin, Vol 22, No. 3, Feb. 1971 -National Policy Conference on Education for Blacks Proceedings, March 29-April 1, 1971, Washington, D.C. - "Black Faith in a Racist Land," from Howard Law Journal, Vol 17, No. 2, 1972 (3) -Inequality in Education, No. 11, March 1972, "Integration: A No Win Policy for Blacks?" -Harvard Law School Bulletin, Vol 23, No. 5, June 1972, "Integration: A No Win Policy for Blacks?" (3) -Criminal Law Bulletin, Vol. 9, No. 1 Book Review of: Race, Crime & Justice, 1972 (3)
